name: Poorly Keys
description:
Description:
Each key on your keyboard has a health bar. Every time you use a key it depletes it's health. If your key runs out of health you cannot use that key and will have to re-map your controls. Use your keys wisely!

Tutorial:
Click and drag on the keys to link them to a function.

Move Left: ???
Move Right: ???
Jump: ???
Exit Fullscreen: Esc 

If you are unsure on how to play, watch the video to the right.
